title.narrative: EDUCATION EPR

description.narrative: Relevant MDAs, LGAs, and NSAs are prepared, have adequate sectoral capacity and provide an effective intra coordinated response in Education in emergencies., which contributes to Education In Emergencies, Equitable Access To Quality Education. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Improved learning outcomes and equitable and inclusive education

sector.narrative: HSS - Risk informed programming including climate resilience disaster and conflict
System strengthening - risk informed programming, including climate, resilience, disaster, conflict, and emergency preparedness

related-activity.ref: 4550/A0/04/105 EQUITY AND QUALITY OF BASIC EDUCATION

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Relevant MDAs, LGAs, and NSAs are prepared, have adequate sectoral capacity and provide an effective intra coordinated response inEducation in emergencies.

description.narrative: Education in emergency (EiE) response capacity has been strengthened in UNICEF supported regions. The new response to Burundian refugees has provided learning opportunities more than 50,000 children in three refugee camps. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:04/08/2016

title.narrative: Focus schools in UN-supported regions with EPR integrated in school improvement plans
